item.description:
Join us for another great day of beachside reggae music, dancing and fun at Surfside 5 Beach Bar and Grill, which overlooks Salisbury beach. It has a huge 8,000 ft oceanfront deck!! The reggae band, "Hot Like Fire", is playing from 4:00pm-8:00pm on the oceanfront deck.

There will likely be a cover charge to see the band. And, they will have a grill on the deck to buy food from.

"Hot Like Fire has emerged as the most sought after authentic reggae party band on the East Coast music scene for the past nineteen years. They perform current, popular reggae and soca music as well as classic favorites by Bob Marley and of course that "Hot Hot Hot" song! New England Performer magazine says Hot Like Fire is "energetic, upbeat and highly addictive". People are always dancin' when Hot Like Fire is jammin'"
(The Band's website)
http://www.hotlikefir....

* HEAVY (all day) RAIN cancels...... (Scattered showers doesn't)
So, please be sure to check for any updates before heading out.

ATTENTION:
This is also listed as a co-event with the Beantown and Beyond Singles group, and the Social Fun group.
* Please only RSVP "Yes" or "maybe" on one of the groups * Thanks.
item.how_to_find_us: I will meet you in the bar area
item.name: Reggae Sunday @ Surfside 5 Beach Bar and Grill in Salisbury
